metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20749 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibVNC before 0.9.12 contains a heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in libvncserver/rfbserver.c. The fix for CVE-2018-15127 was incomplete.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

italc-client - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-management-console - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-master - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
libitalccore - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: italc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1').
libvncserver package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3').
